item.title: 👍Jim Kowalkowski - Rural Education Center
item.description: Jim Kowalkowski signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Rural Education Center.

item.title: 👍💵Julie Salvi - Washington Education Association
item.description: Julie Salvi signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington Education Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Laurie Dolan signed up to testify Pro.
